title: No, This Video Does Not Show PM Modi Getting Ready For A TV Appearance
subtitle: BOOM found that the video is from 2016 when a team from Madame Tussauds museum was in Delhi to take the PM's measurements for a wax statue.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
The text of the post claims the video shows the prime minister prepping for a television appearance. "The amount of makeover this poor man goes through before making a television appearance" (Hindi: टीवी पर आने से पहले इतनी तैयारी करता है ये गरीब आदमी)

A 2016 video showing a team from Madame Tussauds Museum taking measurement of Prime Minister Narendra Modi for his wax statue has gone viral with a false caption. The team was given a sitting by Narendra Modi at his residence in March 2016. A wax statue of the PM is part of Madame Tussauds Museums in London, Singapore, Hong Kong and Bangkok. BOOM had debunked the same video earlier when it was shared with misleading captions claiming the PM had hired a makeup artist for Rs 15 lakhs a month.
